dpInst.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Virtual COM port driver Installer!
dpInst.welcomeIntro: This wizard will walk you through updating the drivers for your Virtual COM port driver.
dpInst.installHeaderTitle: Installing the software for your Virtual COM port driver...
dpInst.finishTitle: Congratulations! You are finished installing your Virtual COM port driver.
dpInst.finishText: Enjoy using the Virtual COM port device.
